pageContext.title: All crisis cards
pageContext.description: A full listing of cards under this tag

front.name: Uncertain Crisis
front.desc: Some situations cannot be solved by skill or virtue, but only good fortune. When you encounter such a crisis, decide what it would take to escape it, such as leaving the area successfully.
prompts: A chaotic natural disaster, such as flooding
Navigating a complex and ever-shifting maze
Entreating with capricious spirits or divinities
front.rule: Define the scope of the crisis, and flip this card

back.name: Uncertain Crisis
back.desc: You may not flip any cards in front of you to generate hits. You may flip shared cards (e.g. Plot cards) or draw/pick a new card (e.g. Condition card, Random oracle card).
back.rule: Flip this card when the crisis is past

front.name: Gauntlet Crisis
front.desc: Some situations are grueling and exhausting, wearing down your reserves faster than you can recover. Sooner or later, something has to give. When you encounter such a crisis, decide what it would take to survive it, such as escaping an enemy or saving a friend.
prompts: A furious and violent vehicle chase
Survival in a hostile and dangerous environment
An extended and grueling magical ritual
front.rule: Define the scope of the crisis, and flip this card

back.name: Gauntlet Crisis
back.desc: You may not flip a card in front of you to generate a hit more than once. You may flip group cards (e.g. Plot cards) or draw/pick a new card (e.g. Condition card, Random oracle card).
back.rule: Flip this card when the crisis is past

front.name: Overwhelming Crisis
front.desc: Some situations will upset a character's mental equilibrium, or present a challenge so daunting that they aren't prepared to handle it immediately. When you encounter such a crisis, decide what it would take to survive it, such as defeating an enemy or finding shelter.
prompts: Sudden teleportation to a new world
front.rule: Define the scope of the crisis, and flip this card

back.name: Overwhelming Crisis
back.desc: Immediately flip all Character cards in front of all players to their back side. Cards may be flipped back and used in the usual way from then on.
back.rule: Flip this card when the crisis is past
